images.caption: Figure 1:The proposed Laffer curve between hard negative miner intelligence and student model performance. We did not collect sufficient data with miner intelligence as the only independent variable, so we leave such data collection to future research.
Figure 8:Frequency of the pairwise comparison models favoring documents on which the ensemble reaches consensus

Figure 9:MSE between the predicted Elos and actual Elos, versus the number of ”inferences” made to the matrix, for four sampling methods; random cycles, random pairs, the bipartite graph, and another method that calculates Elos live and favors pickingi,ji,jwith low current Elo absolute difference
Figure 10:Plots for a few different runs of random sampling; convergence observed around  1.2k/10k total pairs sampled

Figure 12:The upper graph displays NDCG@10 of BM25 alone, compared to using zerank-1 and zerank-1-small on the top 100 results of BM25. The lower graph is the same but for hybrid search instead of BM25.
